meanings.definition: The state or quality of being chill or relaxed.
meanings.sent1: Her chillnesses helped everyone feel calm and relaxed during the storm.
meanings.sent2: I love the chillnesses of a lazy Sunday afternoon.
meanings.sent3: His chillnesses were so contagious that even the grumpiest person couldn't help but smile.
meanings.sent4: The chillnesses of the ocean breeze wrapped around us like a comforting blanket.
meanings.sent5: The chillnesses of the forest at dusk were both peaceful and invigorating.

meanings.definition: A feeling of coldness or coolness.
meanings.sent1: The chillnesses of the ice cream made my teeth ache.
meanings.sent2: I shivered in the chillnesses of the winter wind.
meanings.sent3: The chillnesses of the air-conditioned room were a welcome relief from the heat outside.
meanings.sent4: The chillnesses of the mountain air took my breath away.
meanings.sent5: The chillnesses of the frozen lake warned us to stay off the thin ice.

meanings.definition: A calm and easy-going attitude or demeanor.
meanings.sent1: His chillnesses in the face of chaos were admirable.
meanings.sent2: She faced the challenge with chillnesses that impressed everyone around her.
meanings.sent3: Even under pressure, his chillnesses never wavered.
